details.summary: The role of the British Embassy in Kazakhstan is to promote a prosperous UK-Kazakhstan relationship and the positive development of Kazakhstan in support of UK priorities. We will do this through partnership and cooperation; working together for the benefit of both our countries.
details.description: We have wide-ranging discussions with Kazakhstan, who we regard as a strategic partner in the Central Asian region. This includes energy issues, good governance, democratisation and human rights, the investment climate, regional and international security and stability.
details.services:
Visas

For information on whether you require a visa for the United Kingdom and how to apply go to the link UK Border Agency website

Please note that from 11 December all UK visa applications submitted in Kazakhstan are decided at the UK Border Agency regional hub in Istanbul . This is part of a global move by the British Government to provide an efficient service by processing visa applications in regional centres.

The visa application process for customers in Kazakhstan did not change. You can continue to submit applications and pay the appropriate visa fee on-line through the visa4uk website. Applicants then book an appointment to submit their application form, passport and supporting documents and provide their biometrics at the visa application centre operated by our commercial partner, VFS Global, in Almaty.

Applications and documents submitted in Almaty are taken by secure courier to the regional visa hub in Istanbul, where a decision on the application will be made. Passports and documents are then couriered back to the visa application centre in Almaty, where they can be collected.

Births, deaths and marriages

Information on how you can register a birth or death which occurred overseas, and legal documents for couples marrying or entering into civil partnerships abroad.

Passports and emergency travel documents

How to renew or replace your British passport when visiting the UK and information on getting replacement travel documents if your passport is lost or stolen.

Travel Advice

Information on staying safe and avoiding problems when living or travelling abroad, with links to our embassies, high commissions and other diplomatic posts across the world.

Legalisation Service

How to get official confirmation that your UK public documentation is genuine so it can be accepted by foreign authorities. The UK does not require any documents to be legalised for use within the UK.

details.summary: UK Trade & Investment (UKTI) helps UK-based companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy.
details.description:
UKTI offers expertise and contacts through its extensive network of specialists in the UK, and in British embassies and other diplomatic offices around the world. We provide companies with the tools they require to be competitive on the world stage.

The UK Trade and Investment team in Kazakhstan is based two cities: in the British Embassy in Astana and in Atyrau, West Kazakhstan.

Responsibilities

UKTI in Kazakhstan helps companies in Britain increase their competitiveness through overseas trade in Kazakhstan. We also offer professional, authoritative and personalised assistance to help companies in Kazakhstan locate and expand in the UK.

You can find out more about how we are increasing business with Kazakhstan.
details.services:
Start a business in the UK

UKTI offers dedicated, professional, personalised assistance to help you locate and expand your business in the UK, read about our investment services or contact us to find out more.

Export from the UK

UKTI can assist you on every step of the exporting journey in both the UK and overseas, read about our exporting services or contact us to find out more.

Events

UKTI and its partners stage events in the UK and abroad to help companies looking to export. You can browse scheduled events and register for alerts.

Business opportunities

UKTI is always looking to provide an international network of opportunities for UK Companies looking to export. You can search these opportunities and register for alerts.
